definition[0]: to print a book, story, newspaper article etc again
definition[1]: an occasion when more copies of a book are printed because all the copies of it have been sold
definition[2]: a book that is printed again
definition[3]: if a book, document etc is reprinted, or if it reprints, more copies are printed
example[0]: the costs of redesigning and reprinting stationery
example[1]: The publisher is reprinting 20,000 copies with corrections.
